name: Zakkour Technology Group | Mobile App Development Miami
tagline: Custom Software & MobileApp Development in Miami
description: Zakkour Technology Group has been google ranked as the best mobile app development company in Miami for the past three years. We are a boutique team of passionate programmers with a diverse portfolio of projects ranging from medical prototypes for the hospitals to government contracted transportation apps to dating, shopping and social networking apps. Our company has certified developers with over 50 years of combined experience.
